Detailed Description

Function Documentation

static PyObject* py_callback ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

Registers a callback function to be called after a certain time, but not before the next tick.

(If registered during a tick and it has expired then it will go off still - add a miniscule amount of time to BigWorld.time() to prevent this if unwanted) All times are interpreted as offsets from the current time.

static PyObject* py_cancelCallback ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

Cancels a previously registered callback.

Safe behaviour is NOT guaranteed when cancelling an already executed or cancelled callback.
